Method Detail

penManagerPaused

public void penManagerPaused(boolean paused)
Description copied from interface: PenProvider
Called by the PenManager to notify that all the PenDevices owned by this PenProvider must start/stop sending events.

Parameters:
paused - If true then the devices must stop sending events. If false then the devices must start sending events.

getUseRelativeLocationFilter

public boolean getUseRelativeLocationFilter()
Specified by:
getUseRelativeLocationFilter in interface PenProvider
Overrides:
getUseRelativeLocationFilter in class AbstractPenProvider
Returns:
true if this provider needs a location filter to automatically detect if one of its devices is using mouse (relative) location mode and replace its movement levels values with mouse pointer location values.
